paragraphs.body: Ehasz worked on the highly acclaimed ${link_0} TV series Avatar: The Last Airbender, her only television credit, from 2005 to 2008, writing a total of eight episodes, one of which she also worked on as a story editor. She is married to the series' head writer, ${link_1}, with whom she has a son, Paul.
paragraphs.text: Ehasz worked on the highly acclaimed Nickelodeon TV series Avatar: The Last Airbender, her only television credit, from 2005 to 2008, writing a total of eight episodes, one of which she also worked on as a story editor. She is married to the series' head writer, Aaron Ehasz, with whom she has a son, Paul.
